directions: Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat.  Saute onion, stirring, until tender.  Stir in the rice, raisins, broth, salt and pepper.  Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 15 to 20 minutes, or until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed.  Stir in almonds before serving.
title: Rice with Almonds and Raisins
